Sentencas: The United States has extensive coal resources; thus, it is important to consider coal as a fuel for electric power production.
Titulo: Combined cycle gas turbine power plant with coal gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This work presents a theoretical study of a novel high-efficiency coal-fired power plant.
Titulo: Combined cycle gas turbine power plant with coal gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In the proposed combined cycle power plant, the Conoco coal gasification process is linked with solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) and state-of-the-art gas turbines.
Titulo: Combined cycle gas turbine power plant with coal gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The overall efficiency of such a plant can be around 60 percent, considering realistic heat, pressure, and other losses in the different components of the plant.
Titulo: Combined cycle gas turbine power plant with coal gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: If an additional steam turbine is incorporated the overall efficiency can be increased to about 62 percent.
Titulo: Combined cycle gas turbine power plant with coal gasification and solid oxide fuel cell
